title: If aliens invaded India only, who will help us? - Quora

response.answer_text: We have been invaded countless times and have still survived and floruished. If aliens invade us, they will do the same thing all the other invaders have done throughoiut history - marry Indian girls and settle down in India
Bala Krishna… Nandamuri Balakrishna - Wikipedia watch his movies for how he can…
